medical_history.chief_complaint: Fatigue, body aches, vomiting, and high fever.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with a 1-week history of symptoms after visiting family in rural Honduras.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past medical history includes Kawasaki disease at 3 years of age and acute disseminated encephalomyelitis 3 months prior to the current illness.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's brother died 7 years ago from confirmed familial hemophagocytic lymphohistiocytosis type 3.
medical_history.social_history: Born to non-consanguineous Honduran parents; no additional social history specified.
